reviewText: This is an incredible film looking at the actual events from the 1935 trial, rather than Hollywood's romanticized (yet excellent) version with Tracy and March, not to mention Darren from Bewitched and Col. Potter from M.A.S.H.
If you have seen the film entitled "Inherit the Wind", this documentary is a good summary of what really happened at the Monkey Trial, which is not exactly what Hollywood portrayed.
